mean_cn: n. 中间人；调解者；  adj. 媒介的
mean_en: a person or an organization that helps other people or organizations to make an agreement by being a means of communication between them
sentence: A real estate agent is a trusted intermediary between buyer and seller.
sentence_trans: 房产经纪人是买家和卖家信任的中间人。
word_etyma: inter在…之间 + medi中间 + ary形容词后缀 → intermediary中间的；媒介的；中途的
